content.rendered:
Let’s talk about flow baby – let’s talk about you and me and all things we could build you will see, let’s talk about flow let’s talk about flow… Ok, perhaps i;m not the best singer or song writer, but I do love flow and was inspired to have a few webinars for the community after seeing some Twitter posts showing fear of this amazing feature, and figured, why not share my love of it with anyone willing to listen and perhaps convert a few flownatics along the way, share some lessons learned and failures i’ve had, plus cool tips and awesome tools i’ve found to save others from the trouble.

That’s right, we all fail, and it’s how we move forward that makes a difference (– I just happen to be one of those few people that might overly share my fails to make others more comfortable with theirs). You’ll find the videos and decks on each page.

The Training

excerpt.rendered: Let’s talk about flow baby – let’s talk about you and me and all things we could build you will see… the source of all the links out to my Flow training course for the community
